targets.query:
first = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> first()

last = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> last()

join(tables: {first: first, last: last}, on: ["symbol"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time_last,
    _value: ((r._value_last - r._value_first) / r._value_first) * 100.0,
    _field: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)

first = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> first()

last = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> last()

join(tables: {first: first, last: last}, on: ["symbol"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time_last,
    _value: ((r._value_last - r._value_first) / r._value_first) * 100.0,
    _field: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: false)
  |> limit(n: 1)

first = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> first()

last = from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> last()

join(tables: {first: first, last: last}, on: ["symbol"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _value: ((r._value_last - r._value_first) / r._value_first) * 100.0
  }))
  |> group()
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: r._value,
    _field: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> first()

  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> last()

join(tables: {first: first, last: last}, on: ["symbol"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time_last,
    _value: ((r._value_last - r._value_first) / r._value_first) * 100.0,
    _field: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "volume")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    _value: r._value,
    _field: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "stock_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "close")
  |> group(columns: ["symbol"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r._time,
    price: r._value,
    company: if r.symbol == "COMI" then "Commercial Intl Bank (COMI)" else if r.symbol == "ETEL" then "Egypt Telecom (ETEL)" else if r.symbol == "HRHO" then "Horus Hotel (HRHO)" else if r.symbol == "EKHO" then "El Kahera Housing (EKHO)" else if r.symbol == "AMER" then "Amer Group (AMER)" else if r.symbol == "HELI" then "Heliopolis Co (HELI)" else if r.symbol == "EAST" then "Eastern Company (EAST)" else if r.symbol == "TMGH" then "TMG Holding (TMGH)" else if r.symbol == "CCAP" then "Credit Agricole (CCAP)" else if r.symbol == "ISMA" then "Ismailia Invest (ISMA)" else if r.symbol == "SWDY" then "El Sewedy Electric (SWDY)" else if r.symbol == "CIEB" then "Cairo Investment Bank (CIEB)" else if r.symbol == "PHDC" then "Palm Hills Dev (PHDC)" else if r.symbol == "OCDI" then "Orascom Construction (OCDI)" else if r.symbol == "JUFO" then "Juhayna Food (JUFO)" else if r.symbol == "ORWE" then "Oriental Weavers (ORWE)" else r.symbol
  }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "price", "company"])
